column3: Reporting area for Land utilisation statistics (Col.3 = Col.4+Col.7+ Col.11+Col.14+Col.15)
column5: Not available for cultivation - Area under non-agricultural uses (Col.5)
column6: Not available for cultivation - Barren and unculturable Land (Col.6)
column7: Not available for cultivation - Total (Col.7 = Col.5+Col.6)
column8: Other uncultivated Land excluding Fallow Land - Permanent pastures & other Grazing Lands (Col.8)
column9: Other uncultivated Land excluding Fallow Land - Land under Misc. tree crops & groves (not incl. in net area sown) (Col.9)
column10: Other uncultivated Land excluding Fallow Land - Culturable waste Land (Col.10)
column11: Other uncultivated Land excluding Fallow Land - Total (Col.11 = Col.8 to Col.10)
column12: Fallow Lands - Fallow Lands other than current fallows (Col.12)
column17: Area sown more than once (Col.17 = Col.16-Col.15)
column18: Agricultural Land/Cultivable Land/Culturable Land/Arable Land (Col.18 = Col.9+Col.10+Col.14+Col.15)
column20: Cropping Intensity (Col.20 = % of Col.16 over Col.15)
